intro.dialogue: You know, I kind of regret offering to carry Aaliyah. These tentacles weigh like feathers, but giving a piggyback ride to an adult instead of a kid really does make a difference.
It was worth it though, she seems really happy to be in this part of the park.
I don't think she's been able to truly experience how nice this park actually is.
This place is so beautiful! I never got to spend much time here before! You chose a good spot!
Thank you! I came across it when I first came here.
Does Earth have any of these kinds of places?
Loads! Not all are as colorful and peaceful though.
Well, from what I've heard, this place isn't too peaceful either. The park is fine, but the city in the far distance has a bad reputation.
Why?
Lots of criminal activity from what I've heard. If you plan on going there, watch your back.
Really? I'll make sure I watch my back.
Good, I wouldn't want to see the hottie in front of me get hurt. I'd have to patch you right up.
You could patch me up anytime.
Oh, how adorable! Young people are so cocky!
Young? If you think I'm young, how old are you?
My my, have you never been taught to not ask a lady for her age! Just kidding, I'm 32 love.
Really? You sure don't look the part. You look 10 years younger at least!
Oh, don't make me blush!
To be honest, 10 might be a bit of an overstatement, but I never thought she would be older than 26. She's hot though, I dig it.
So what do you do in your free time?
That's such a stupid question. She physically can't leave the pond. What is she gonna say? SWIM?
Well, I obviously can't go far by myself, so I usually hang out in the pond and strike up conversations with hotties crossing my way.
You do seem like quite the extrovert.
Awh, thank you! You learn to love it if it's the only way to get any way of social interaction.
Is that why you were so eager to go out on a date with me?
Well, I'd be lying if I didn't admit it's the reason I first talked to you. Though I must say, you looked rather nice. Can't expect me not to pass up asking you out on a date when you look like that.
Man this girl is flirting with me hard, I'm not sure if I dislike it though!
My my, you sure do love calling me hot, don't you?
Well, that's totally fine. But a cutie like you needs to hear they're hot too every once in a while.
Oh stop, you're making me blush. The damn nerve of young people these days.
Oh come on Aaliyah, you're still young! Stop calling yourself old!
Quite the gentleman's response! Hu hu hu hu! You got your manners taught right back home for sure!
I'm starting to feel light-headed and warm inside. I think we might need to go back. I'm afraid I'll dry out otherwise.
I had an amazing time though, thank you!

How do you wish her well?
Press W for just saying bye.
Press S to propperly wish her well

happy.dialogue: Yeah it was amazing. Take care alright! See you later!
